title: TouchCameraMovementMode

name: TouchCameraMovementMode
type: enum
summary: |
  Changes the touch camera movement mode currently in-use by the client using a
  TouchEnabled device.
description: |
  Changes the touch camera movement mode currently in-use by the client using a
  TouchEnabled device.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Default
    summary: |
      Default mode used by Roblox core scripts.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Classic
    summary: |
      Default mode used by Roblox core scripts.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Follow
    summary: |
      Camera moves with the subject and rotates to keep the subject in the
      center.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Orbital
    summary: |
      The camera locks at a certain angle. Once it's set, players can rotate the
      camera, but it will always maintain a consistent angle to the ground.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
